summary: A young girl lost in the loneliness and boredom of reality finds solace in an ill boy, whom she can visit in a surreal dream world that she drew in her school composition book.
cast: Charlotte Burke|Jane Bertish|Samantha Cahill|Glenne Headly|Sarah Newbold|Gary Bleasdale|Elliott Spiers|Gemma Jones|Steven O'Donnell|Ben Cross|Karen Gledhill|Barbara Keogh
keywords: boy|dream world|nightmare|drawing comes to life|family relationships
title: La casa de papel
